title: Sampler, 1791
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, wool foundation
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave
inscribed: Initialed "I. E. R." with the year "1791."
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 131 x 33 cm (51 9/16 x 13 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Geometric and floral cross borders with alphabets and numerals.  Biblical scenes, people, birds and animals.  Initialed "I. E. R." with the year "1791."
